name: Enchantment
description: Charmers who bend the wills of others with magic.

2.name: Enchantment Savant
2.description: The gold and time you must spend to copy an enchantment spell into your spellbook is halved.

2.name: Hypnotic Gaze
2.description: As an action, choose a creature within 5 feet that can see or hear you; it must succeed on a Wisdom save or be charmed, incapacitated, and speed 0 until the end of your next turn. You can maintain the effect with actions but cannot use it again on that creature until after a long rest.

6.name: Instinctive Charm
6.description: When a creature you can see within 30 feet attacks you, use your reaction to force it to target the nearest creature other than you, unless it succeeds on a Wisdom save.

10.name: Split Enchantment
10.description: When you cast an enchantment spell of 1st level or higher that targets only one creature, you can have it target a second creature.

14.name: Alter Memories
14.description: When you charm a creature with an enchantment spell, you can make it unaware of being charmed and, once before the spell ends, force an Intelligence save to make it forget up to 1 + your Charisma modifier hours of time.
